item.title: Report E-2024060043
item.description:
Report E-2024060043

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-17T18:16:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-30
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On May 30, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1779 was damaged due to faulty packaging and released approximately one-half (0.5) gallon of product to the top of the drum. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. HES personnel identified one (1) damaged 55-gallon drum of UN1779 formic acid and overpacked it in one (1) 85-gallon metal salvage drum. No release could be observed to the trailer floor, so crews proceeded to label the one (1) 85-gallon salvage drum as hazardous waste and staged the salvage drum the terminal's waste holding room.
